title: Scottish Dundee cake
ingredients: ['225g butter', '225g soft brown sugar', 'zest of 1 lemon', 'zest of 1 orange', '55g glace cherries, halved', '170g raisins', '55g currants', '125g sultanas', '110g mixed peel', '300g plain flour', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '55g ground almonds', '4 eggs', '2 tablespoons brandy', '55g blanched almonds']
